description: Defines a list of items the mob wants to share or pick up. Items can be configured with optional parameters to control pickup, sharing, and inventory behavior.

tokens.text: can pick up and share items

generated_doNotEdit.title: Shareables
generated_doNotEdit.description: Defines a list of items the mob wants to share. Each item must have the following parameters:

fields.title: All Items
fields.description: A bucket for all other items in the game. Note this category is always least priority items.

fields.title: All Items Max Amount
fields.description: Maximum number of this item the mob will hold.

fields.title: All Items Surplus Amount
fields.description: Number of this item considered extra that the entity wants to share.

fields.title: All Items Want Amount
fields.description: Number of this item this entity wants to share.

fields.title: Items
fields.description: List of items or item tags that the entity wants to share. Items in-game will match to this list from top to bottom, meaning that the first occurance of a match, be it name or tag, will shadow those coming after.

subForm.description: List of items or item tags that the entity wants to share. Items in-game will match to this list from top to bottom, meaning that the first occurance of a match, be it name or tag, will shadow those coming after.

fields.title: Admire
fields.description: Mob will admire the item after picking up by looking at it. For this to happen the mob needs to have an Admire component and an Admire goal.

fields.title: Barter
fields.description: Mob will barter for the item after picking it up. For this to work the mob needs to have a Barter component and a Barter goal.

fields.title: Consume Item
fields.description: Determines whether the mob will consume the item or not.

fields.title: Craft Into
fields.description: Defines the item this entity wants to craft with the item defined by "item". Should be an item name.

fields.title: Item
fields.description: The name of the item. Aux value can be specified, for instance 'minecraft:skull:1'. Alternatively, a tag can be specified to match all items with that tag.

fields.title: Max Amount
fields.description: Maximum number of this item the mob will hold.

fields.title: Pickup Limit
fields.description: Maximum number items the mob will pick up during a single goal tick.

fields.title: Pickup Only
fields.description: Determines whether the mob can only pickup the item and not drop it.

fields.title: Priority
fields.description: Prioritizes which items the entity prefers. 0 is the highest priority.

fields.title: Stored In Inventory
fields.description: Determines whether the mob will try to put the item in its inventory if it has the inventory component and if it can't be equipped.

fields.title: Surplus Amount
fields.description: Number of this item considered extra that the entity wants to share.

fields.title: Want Amount
fields.description: Number of this item this entity wants to share.

fields.title: Singular Pickup
fields.description: Boolean value that controls if the mob is able to pick up more of the same item if it is already holding that item
